column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I went here with my BFF and my boyfriend after Escape the Room recently over the weekend.  It was a great experience overall.  I would go again.  The highlights: gyoza; lychee cosmos; and the waiter helped me customize a noodle bowl so that I didn't have to have soup but could have the same ingredients as what was in one of the soups.  The service was great when we went
column2: and the staff all greeted everyone enthusiastically.  The noodles seem to be very fresh and they were delicious.  This is not your 5 for $1 ramen
column5: you often have to pay.  The price was fairly dear consider this is a soup joint
